title: Problem in Bulgaria
body: More people in Bulgaria have problem with the new client. Im with really good computer, please fix this problem, because i cant play normal..

replies.body: So i have this issue 2 , i am from Bulgaria Veliko Turnovo guys , you what i know , the problem 2 weeks ago didn't existed ,now it does ,so please fix it ,because it aint from us :) cheers <3

Im from Plovdiv(Bulgaria) and im having this problem too, I write somewhere in the forum. Just like most of the players it was fine for a couple of days and then went from descent to broken. I try this VPN cyberghost software and it worked for me. Sadly its increasing the MS but still playable so yes try VPN. Thank you.

We've seen a few reports of ISP issues from players on EUNE, especially from this region.  We have a[ pinned thread ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu)about it here, but we don't have control over ISPs especially those that aren't on the peering network.  As an alternative step, try the Configure DNS step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to see if re-routing might help or using a VPN.  

You can also get us a better overview of where the hiccups are coming from by downloading [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and routing to 31.186.224.42.

Hopefully that might help in the meantime.


**Update**:  It looks like Eambo [made a post ](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/9aupEmoP-23-06-17-issues-with-bulgaria-and-surrounding-regions)on this over at the EU Boards.  If you're still having an issue, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look.
